title: Enchanting Diamond Dangler Earrings - Aadhunika Jhumka
materials: Round Cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds. Features our signature Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine and resistance to tarnishing.
features: These elegant earrings feature a contemporary twisted drop design, embellished with sparkling CZ diamonds. The diamonds are meticulously set in a prong setting, allowing maximum light to enhance their brilliance. The earrings have a secure hook closure for comfortable wear. The lightweight design makes them perfect for extended wear.
occasions: and everyday elegance. A sophisticated choice for receptions and special gatherings.
description: These dangler earrings offer a blend of modern design and timeless elegance. The high-quality CZ diamonds provide the brilliance of real diamonds at an accessible price point. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine, and the lightweight design guarantees comfort. An ideal gift or self-purchase for adding a touch of sparkle to any outfit.
